pages.text: To succeed in this world, you need to choose a profession that suits you best. $(br2)Currently, there are three professions to choose from: warrior, tank, and mage. You can switch to the desired profession by using the corresponding profession item. $(br2)You can check your profession level below EMC in the top left corner of the screen.

There is only one way to level up in the EMCWorld, which is to consume EMC. $(br2)Each time you consume EMC, you will gain a certain amount of experience points. $(br2)The initial maximum level for players is 10, and you need to craft different items to increase the level cap and unlock new skills. $(br2)You can view your profession information and skill list at the Profession Station Core.
